Comments_List: I learned a lot about the language of Czech and about Czech culture. Although not quite fluent, I feel comfortable with reading and writing the language using future, present, and past tenses.
Continued to better underwear and grammar and expand my vocabulary. Improved reading comprehension as well.
Czech is a very challenging language to learn, but Professor von Kunes makes it possible!
I learned about czech culture, skills in particular was grammar.
Gained a vast knowledge of Czech grammar and vocabulary
No weaknesses. Strengths included fun and tight-knit learning environment. As well as a very dedicated and knowledgeable teacher.
I would have liked for the lessons to be more structured.
Yes, 100%. The most fun and interesting class I have taken so far here at Yale.
If you are interested in learning a unique language unlike any other than take Czech.
Absolutely, I wanted to take a language that I didnt know very much about as I had already taken some French and Spanish in high school.  I loved my decision to take Czech.
I would recommend this course 10 times out of 10. This is not only because of the fact that Czech is a great language, but mainly because of the fact the Professor Von Kunes is an amazing teacher.
